Download-Component.ready-to-ride: Gotów wsiąść na pokład? Wybierz swoją konfigurację sprzętową i pobierz ISO.
Download-Component.hwe-version: Czy masz urządzenie Surface lub ASUS?
Download-Component.grab-iso: Ściągnij ISO stąd, aby zainstalować na czysto:
Download-Component.title: Pobierz Aurorę
Download-Component.gpu-description: Wybierz swoją główną kartę graficzną, aby pobrać edycję z zainstalowanymi odpowiednimi sterownikami dla twojego sprzętu.
Download-Component.ventoy-not-supported: Nasze pliki ISO nie wspierają Ventoya.
Download-Component.choose-gpu: Powyżej wybierz swoją kartę graficzną, aby móc rozpocząć pobieranie

Introduction.title: Aurora,
Introduction.stargazer: Witaj astronomie, Aurora na ciebie czeka.
Introduction.powered: Oparta na odlotowym KDE i Universal Blue, stworzona dla ciebie.
Introduction.onboard: Wsiądź na pokład statku lecącego do twojego nowego systemu.
Introduction.gaze: Razem wpatrujmy się w gwiazdy, drogi podróżniku.
Introduction.tagline: jest tutaj. Ciesz się szanującym prywatność, szybkim i stabilnym doświadczeniem na swoim komputerze.
Introduction.loop-7: Graj i pracuj dopóki siły braknie.

About-Aurora.reliable: Aurora jest obrazem dla osób, które chcą niezawodnego, bezpicznego i płynnego doświadczenia podczas wykonywania codziennych czynności.
About-Aurora.simply-delightful-text: Aurora dostarcza lekko dostosowaną KDE Plasmę dla super płynnego i rozkosznego doświadczenia, które może być nieskończenie personalizowane.
About-Aurora.speed-reliability-text: Idealnie skonfigurowana i zoptymizowana dla maksymalnej wydajności i nizawodności jakby to była stuletnia maszyna.
About-Aurora.speed-reliability-purple: Twój komputer już nigdy nie będzie taki sam.
About-Aurora.zero-maintenance-text: System musi być zainstalowany tylko raz. Aktualizacje aplikacji i systemu są automatycznie pobierane w tle.
About-Aurora.zero-maintenance-purple: Skonfiguruj i zapomnij, tak jak sny.
About-Aurora.hardware-support-text: Mamy osobne edycja dla użytkowników z urzędzeniami Surfacje i ASUS, wszyskie zawierają rozszerzone wsparcie dla padów do gier, drukarek i wielu więcej.
About-Aurora.hardware-support-purple: Nie zapomnij wydrukować faktur za statek.

About-AuroraDx.pro-stargazing: Jesteś profesjonalistą w oglądaniu gwiazd? Edycja dla programistów opiera się na doskonałym fundamencie i podkręca jego doświadczenie na jedenastkę.
About-AuroraDx.brew-ready-text: Brew jest preinstalowany i gotowy do użytko w Aurorze. Używaj go, aby zainstalować każde narzędzie CLI, o którym mogłeś nigdy nie marzyć. Brew jest bezpiecznie zintegrowany, aby nie rozwalać twojego systemu.
About-AuroraDx.containers-best-friends-text: Docker i Podman są już skonfigurowane, tak że pasują do każdego rodzaju przepływu pracy, w tym kontenerowanego doświadczenia CLI. A z Ptyxis, twoje distroboxy są pod ręką.
About-AuroraDx.containers-best-friends-red: Już nigdy nie mów 'działa na mojej maszynie'
About-AuroraDx.preconfigured-work: Skonfigurowana i gotowa na poważną pracę.
About-AuroraDx.preconfigured-work-text: Visual Studio Code jest zainstalowany i skonfigurowany, aby wspierać organizację zadań taką jak DevContainers. Oraz jedną komendą, możesz pobrać Jetbrains Toolbox jeśli wolisz kawkę.
About-AuroraDx.preconfigured-work-red: Lub korzystaj z neovima, jeśli umiesz z niego wyjść.
About-AuroraDx.robots-take-over-text: Masz ochotę na lokalne LLMy lub inne uczenie maszynowe, Aurora jest również na to gotowa. Uruchamiaj prywatne LLMs Ollamą, odpal distroboxa pytorch, aby robić bardziej poważną robotę z SI.
About-AuroraDx.robots-take-over-red: Korzystaj z robotów na swoją korzyść.

Build-Your-Own.want-to-build: Do you want to build your own image? Want to extend Aurora with your custom themes and bling? Use our image template to help you get started. All you need is some working knowledge on containerization with Docker and a little bit of time. Let's goooo!

Footer.proudly-built-phrase: a community toolkit designed to reboot the Linux desktop. Built for the love of the game. Welcome to Indie Cloud Native.
Footer.built-with-love: Built with ❤️ from contributors around the world.
Footer.background-images: Background Images by Jonatan Pie from
Footer.not-affiliated: Aurora is not affiliated and or endorsed by The Fedora Project, KDE e.V., The KDE Project, Red Hat, Microsoft, ASUS or any other companies mentioned above.

FAQ.faq-intro: Interested in more details? Find answers to the most burning questions.

q1.question: Can I get GNOME with that?
q1.answer: If you'd like GNOME rather than KDE, install Bluefin!

q2.question: What is Aurora Developer Edition? (Aurora-DX)?
q2.answer: Aurora Developer Edition is a special edition of Aurora featuring various additional packages that cater to a development audience. These included preinstalled VS Code with DevContainer capabilities, Docker and Podman as container runtimes, tools for creating and managing virtual machines, tools to create a containerized development environment with DevPod and much more. The developer experience also includes various tools for cloud-native developers. You can always install more via brew! If you want the raw package list, click the link.

q3.question: What's the difference between Vanilla Kinoite and Aurora?
q3.answer: Vanilla Kinoite is a very stock experience. Aurora includes many enhancements and tweaks, like included drivers for various printers, network adapters, game controllers and more as well as included codecs.

q4.question: Where can I get the latest news and discussions about Aurora?
q4.answer: Check out our Discourse forums for the latest updates and discussions on Aurora.

For-You.title: How does Aurora fit in for you?
For-You.subtitle: Here are a few reasons why you should consider using Aurora.
For-You.automatic-updates-text: Aurora downloads and applies updates automatically in the background. This includes the operating system itself and all installed applications.
For-You.automatic-updates-highlight: Let us take care of your updates.
For-You.hardware-support-text: Aurora includes support for all graphics cards and CPUs, including GPUs from Nvidia. Expanded hardware support extends to game controllers and more printer drivers.
For-You.helping-you-text: We include scripts and common utilities to help you get started quickly and set up some common pieces of software in an non intrusive way.

For-Developers.title: Aurora for developers
For-Developers.subtitle: Building on a great foundation, Aurora Developer Experience (DX) is designed to make the lives of every developer easy by bundling commonly used tools and applications into one package.
For-Developers.local-ai-text: By including GPU drivers and commonly used utilities for local AI, Aurora makes it easy for you to get started with running your own AI at home.
For-Developers.local-ai-highlight: The robots are here to serve you.
For-Developers.containers-text: Aurora Developer Experience includes Docker and Podman, offering choice and flexibility for the most demanding container-based workflows.
For-Developers.dev-tools: Developer tools are a click away.
For-Developers.dev-tools-text: The developer experience includes commonly used developer tools like VS Code and comes preconfigured for containerized development workflows with DevContainers. Jetbrains Products are only a command away.
For-Developers.dev-tools-highlight: Everything you need, out of the box.
For-Developers.homebrew-text: Aurora automatically includes Homebrew with every installation, making it easy to discover, install and keep your favorite CLI tools up to date. Find thousands of libraries and tools in the brew libraries, safely integrated to never mess with your host system.
For-Developers.homebrew-highlight: Dev tooling has never been more convenient.

Your-New-Desktop.title: This is your new desktop.
Your-New-Desktop.subtitle: Power on and feel right at home when using your computer, from the first moment on. No distractions or ads. Develop faster than ever before. Explore the galaxy. Write your next novel.
Your-New-Desktop.kde-text: Aurora is built around the customizable and adaptable KDE Plasma Desktop Environment, carefully customized by us to provide the best experience out of the box.
Your-New-Desktop.kde-highlight: Feel right at home from day one.
Your-New-Desktop.defaults-text: With a set of carefully selected applications and chosen defaults, Aurora is built for daily usage and is easy, fun and productive. It takes care of you and works alongside you.
Your-New-Desktop.defaults-highlight: Everything configured, nothing to worry about.

Paradigm-Shift.title: Aurora is a paradigm shift for Linux.
Paradigm-Shift.subtitle: To rethink the Linux Desktop experience from the ground up, we built Aurora on new technology and principles. What does this mean for you?
Paradigm-Shift.rock-solid-text-1: We built Aurora on completely different technology and principles compared to a normal Linux Desktop.
Paradigm-Shift.rock-solid-text-2: Updates are built and tested before they ever reach you and are a single image that gets applied in the background.
Paradigm-Shift.rock-solid-text-3: And if a new version of Aurora breaks something, you can rollback to a known-good state.
Paradigm-Shift.app-store-text: Utilizing the power of the Flathub App Store, we have a unified and one-stop shop for app developers and app users alike. For the first time, there is a unified app store for the Linux platform where developers can publish their apps easily and earn money to support their OSS work.
Paradigm-Shift.app-store-highlight: It's the year of the Linux App Store.
Paradigm-Shift.extendable-text: Aurora is nothing more than a collection of bash scripts, containerfiles and custom programs stitched together. This makes it easy to audit, contribute and help out. By building a easy entry-point for developers, we hope to encourage contributions from new users. Go on this journey with us.
Paradigm-Shift.extendable-highlight: The power of Docker is here for the desktop. Wowza.

Contributors.title: For the community, by the community.
Contributors.subtitle: Aurora is built and maintained by the community, for the community. We are passionate in what we do.
Contributors.error: Contributors could not be loaded. Please try again later.

Docs-Community.title: Documentation & Community
Docs-Community.subtitle: If you want to consult our documentation, contribute to it or need help / want to hang out in our community, you will find it here. We have forums and a Discord server.
Docs-Community.docs-text: Get help by reading the docs, or contribute to them if you want to improve them.
Docs-Community.community-text: We have forums for you to ask questions and discuss technical topics, or join our Discord server to hang out and chat with fellow Aurora users and developers.

Contributors-Page.title: Our Contributors
Contributors-Page.subtitle: Aurora is built by passionate people from around the world. Thank you to all contributors and maintainers who make Aurora possible.
Contributors-Page.sponsor-subtitle: Many of our contributors accept sponsorships. Your support helps keep Aurora development active and sustainable.
Contributors-Page.all-contributors-subtitle: Everyone who has contributed code to the Aurora repository.
Contributors-Page.join-subtitle: We welcome contributions of all kinds - code, documentation, translations, and more!
Contributors-Page.footer-note: Thank you to all our contributors for making Aurora possible.

Art-Page.title: Aurora Art Gallery
Art-Page.subtitle: Discover the artwork created by humans for Aurora.
Art-Page.contribute-description: Aurora is dedicated to supporting real art made by humans. Every month a new wallpaper will be delivered directly to you. Want to contribute your own? PR it to our Wallpaper repo, and anyone will be able to install it with brew. If we love your work we might commission you for next months official wallpaper.
